    Terms and Privacy Policy

    1. Acceptance The Use Of Mahaveer’s Machine Learning Page Terms and Conditions

You will not use the Website for any purpose that is unlawful or prohibited by these Terms and Conditions. By using the Website you are fully accepting the terms, conditions and disclaimers contained in this notice. If you do not accept these Terms and Conditions you must immediately stop using the Website.

    2. CREDIT CARD DETAILS
      Mahaveer’s Machine Learning Page will never ask for your credit card details and we advice our customers to not enter their credit cards details on Mahaveer’s Machine Learning Page website or by submitting such details in any other form.

    3. LEGAL ADVICE

Any link to other websites is not an endorsement of such websites and you acknowledge and agree that we are not responsible for the content or availability of any such sites.

None of the content may be downloaded, copied, reproduced, transmitted, stored, sold or distributed without the prior written consent of the copyright holder. This excludes the downloading, copying and/or printing of pages of the Website for personal, non-commercial home use only.

    9. INDEMNITY

    10. SEVERANCE
